source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: Popular Cocktail Recipes - A masterclass in cocktails
items.headline: We have compiled a video course and recipe's to get you making cocktails at home in no time, with family and friends!
objectives_summary: Make cocktails with a fast progression
Make cocktails in a fun and friendly environment
We covers all aspects needed from making cocktails from ingredients to glassware and utensils around the house.

items.title: Wine Primer - Learn wine from a Certified Sommelier
items.headline: An engaging intro to wine that turns you into an overnight expert. You've never taken a wine course like this before!
objectives_summary: Become a wine expert in two hours
Pick wines with confidence in all situations—from the restaurant to the housewarming party
How to articulate what you like and don't like with confidence

items.title: Food Dehydrating Made Easy! For Fruit, Veggies, Meat & more!

visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.job_title: Website and Course Creator + Copywriter + Ex-Drinker ;-)
visible_instructors.title: Susan Gast

items.headline: Never Run Out of Food! Dehydrate Fresh or Frozen Fruit and Veggies - Perfect for Preppers - and Long-Term Food Storage!
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ
objectives_summary: Dehydrate Food Following my Six Simple Steps
Choose which dehydrator bests suits your needs
Benefit from knowing how to dehydrate fresh, frozen, or canned fruits and veggies - and meat

items.title: Fabioulous Pizza

visible_instructors.name: Fabio
visible_instructors.job_title: Chef | Amazon best selling author | Award winning educator
visible_instructors.title: Fabio Errante

items.headline: Learn the tricks of a professionals and bring them into your kitchen. True, authentic, italian pizza ?
objectives_summary: Make the best homemade pizza, using what you have at home.

items.title: Sourdough Bread Baking For Beginners.
items.headline: A Guide To Baking Perfectly, Imperfect Sourdough Bread From Scratch.
objectives_summary: Learn traditional sourdough bread making techniques from Thomas Charles Mathiassen, the founder of organic Nordic bakery, Charles Good Food.
Through detailed video you'll learn the step-by step sourdough bread making process from creating the sourdough starter to baking the finished loaf.
Learn how to mix sourdough by hand using basic equipment, and gain the skills to know when the sourdough is ready to fold, ferment and bake.

items.title: Keto Diet Principles and Recipes
items.headline: Cook Your Way Through Losing Weight Wisely! Ketogenic diet basic principles and easy-to-cook delicious recipes.
objectives_summary: You will enjoy losing weight in a very relaxed and tasty formula.
You will master your own eating habbits and unhealthy cravings.
You will understand better how your body works, therefore you will know how to treat it better.

items.title: Online Pastry School - Gluten Free Bread Baking Course

visible_instructors.name: Marco
visible_instructors.job_title: Fourth Generation Pastry Chef, Twenty Five (25) Years Exp.
visible_instructors.title: Marco Ropke

items.headline: Learn great tasting, easy to follow recipes and methods to make gluten free breads by Chef Marco Ropke
objectives_summary: Understanding what gluten is, and the science behind it.
Know why things turn out right, and why they sometimes turn out wrong.
How to make the best Gluten Free breads anyone has ever had.

items.title: Learn How to Make Chocolate Truffles
items.headline: Including strawberry lemon, milk chocolate lavender honey and dark chocolate mocha truffles!
objectives_summary: Learn about chocolate truffles
Review ingredients and equipment
Create three kinds of ganache

items.title: Quick and Easy Non Dairy Cheese Course

visible_instructors.name: Manuel
visible_instructors.job_title: Culinary Chefs Through The art Of Delicious Cooking
visible_instructors.title: Manuel Caride

items.headline: Learn how to make Natural Dairy Free Cheese Dishes in as little as 15 minutes (With Bonus Recipes)
objectives_summary: You will learn to make 6 Quick & Easy cheeses, both liquid and solid. You will also have the tools and knowledge to incorporate these dishes into a few amazing meals.
You will acquire the knowledge to create a cheese base that you can then add your personal flavor and touch to design your own cheese.
Food prep ingredients that most people are nervous to try i.e. Agar Agar &  Jalapeños

items.title: Fantastic Floral Buttercream Cakes
items.headline: Combine classic and modern techniques to create buttercream flower designs. A great intermediate cake decorating course.
objectives_summary: Build and frost square or rectangular cakes smooth with sharp edges.
Create re-usable surfaces to practice decorating techniques.
Learn how to pipe and use a brush to create buttercream embroidery.

items.title: Cheesecake for Beginners
items.headline: Learn all of the fundamentals needed to make delicious, creamy, decadent cheesecakes.  Beginners welcome!
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: Successfully make a cheesecake that has a desirable taste, texture, and visual appeal.
Understand how to use the base cheesecake recipe to create a multitude of variations.
Make different types of crust for cheesecakes.

items.title: Chocolate Bon Bon
items.headline: Mastering the Art of Chocolate Design
objectives_summary: Chocolate Bon Bons
Cleaning and preparing your chocolate moulds
The secret behind the mirror shine on your bon bons

items.title: Learn Chinese Home Cooking Fundamentals in 6 Tasty recipes

visible_instructors.name: Yang
visible_instructors.job_title: A Chinese cooking fanatic. A foodie with love for cultures.
visible_instructors.title: Yang Peng

items.headline: Cook your own authentic Chinese food at home, led by 6 curated Chinese recipes, from easy to advanced. Free Recipe PDFs
objectives_summary: Cook authentic Chinese food at home
Understand the 5 essential Chinese sauces that create most of Chinese flavours
Master 6 Chinese recipes that you can cook with common cooking equipment

items.title: Edit Professional Looking Cooking Videos in an Hour or Less

visible_instructors.name: Michelle
visible_instructors.job_title: Producer at Vegan Cooking with Love
visible_instructors.title: Michelle Johnson

items.headline: Learn the streamlined workflow that I've followed for years that saves me time and actually watch me edit a video live.
objectives_summary: Know which features of your editing program you must master to quickly edit your cooking videos
Understand what branding is and what matters more than your logo when it comes to branding your videos
Learn the best way to organize your files before you begin editing

items.title: Professional French Pastry Foundation Level - Part 1

visible_instructors.name: True
visible_instructors.job_title: Video Cooking Classes by Professional Chef Professors
visible_instructors.title: True Foodies

items.headline: Taught by Chef Professor Philippe Salomon - Professor of Pastry for 18 years at Ferrandi culinary school in France
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of pastry, the doughs, the fillings, the essentials and how to make some great French Tarts
Be able to cook amazing French tarts and be ready to take the next step to more sophisticated pastries such as profiteroles, chocolate éclairs and Paris-Brest.

items.title: Introduction to Beer and Beer Tasting
items.headline: Learn how beer is made, how it came to be what it is now, what beer styles are and how beer tasting works!
objectives_summary: Beer Ingredients
Beer Production Process
History of Beer
